pages.text: $(9)保護$()不再排斥保護的子類型附魔。$(p)這意味著現在可以擁有$(9)保護$()和另一種通常會排斥的防禦附魔。

To account for this, the effectiveness of protection enchantments is modified slightly.$(p)Understanding how means learning a bit about how protection works, and some math.$(p)To begin, we introduce the concept of a Damage Reduction (DR) point, which is the stat that all defensive enchantments benefit.

The $(9)Protection$() enchant provides 1 point against all damage types.$(p)Specialized enchants provide 2 points against one specific type.$(p)$(9)Feather Falling$() provides 3 points against fall damage.

The first 20 points provide 4% DR each, up to 80% total.$(p)In Vanilla, 20 points is the max, and any extra have no effect.$(p)With Apotheosis, the next 45 points provide an additional 0.33% each, up to 95% total (at 65 points).$(p)Armor is applied before enchantments.
